#################################################

Release Name:
Tradewinds.(Sandlot.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Tradewinds
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 800MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP or Vista
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Tradewinds_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

How business-savvy are you? Use your intuition to make smart business trades with foreigners in the original Tradewinds! Build your empire and sail the mystic seas as you journey to distant islands and barter with shrewd merchants. Buy low, sell high, and strive to achieve the ultimate rank of Tai Pan! Finance your future and live for sheer adventure. Flee from pirates or choose to face them in a duel - then collect a bounty when you win. Accrue millions with smart trades and some good fortune in the game that started the series, Tradewinds!

#################################################

FAQs
Q: Is this the full game?
A: Yes.

Q: Does this require Steam?
A: No.

Q: Do I need an unlock code?
A: No.

Q: Do I need any of the WildTangent Games platform crap?
A: No.

Q: Is this multilingual?
A: No. English is the only language supported.

Q: Will this installer work on a Mac?
A: Buy me a Mac and I'll figure it out.

Q: Does this contain viruses?
A: No.

Q: Will you marry me?
A: No.
